I am a fool, philosopher, software craftsman, maker of makers in search of wisdom and enlightenment.

Enrique Comba Riepenhausen Thoughts of a restless mind

Talks

I have given a number of talks over the years. Some have been recorded some haven't. For some of them I have the slides, for others I don't...

Here I am trying to compile together the talks I have given in the past and sharing them with you.

  • 15th of November 2014 : Facilitating the Global Day of Code Retreat in London.
  • 6th of November 2014 : Craftsmanship over Hype - In this talk I spoke about my experiences, how they influenced my thinking, and what drives me now.
  • 22nd of August 2014 : Mushin no shin - During this lightning talk I spoke about the concept of the mind that is no mind during the Makers Academy Talks Night.
  • 21st of October 2013 : Agile and XP Basics - Introductory session ran at Makers Academy.
  • 4th of April 2013 : The Impersonator Pattern - A talk about a better approach to writing cucumber step definitions and features given at Skills Matter during the Cuke Up! 2013 event.
  • 8th of December 2011 : Facilitating the Global Day of Code Retreat in Costa Rica.
  • 5th of November 2011 : TEDx Zaragoza - Talked about how the reptilian brain controls our lives and how you can trick for your personal happiness.
  • 7th of May 2011 : Facilitating a Code Retreat in Valladolid.
  • 7th - 9th of April 2011 : Don't build another Tower of Babel! ; Scottish Ruby Conference.
  • 12th of March 2011 : Facilitating a Code Retreat in Winchester.
  • 4th of February 2011 : Agile Coaches Gathering, Madrid.
  • 8th of January 2011 : DevOpenMadrid, Madrid.
  • 7th of January 2011 : 15en5, Madrid.
  • 4th of January 2011 : Coding Dojo, Madrid.
  • 12th - 13th of November 2010 : AOS 2010, Barcelona.
  • 14th - 16th of October 2010 : The Forsaken Value, Software Craftsmanship North America, Chicago.
